name: Circuit Sweeper
description:
--May not work with Chrome--     

A game created for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Theme: Joined Together.

You keep circuits and the power between them joined together. Dust off circuits before they overheat. Generate over 100% power before the time runs out.

Seems simple enough, right? For a game jam, I mean. DISCLAMER: This is not a AAA game.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move;

G,H,V,B to interact/clean/repair;

Esc/P to pause;

R to restart circuit;

Mouse to, you know, CLICK on things. Like buttons.

Everything but the music created by me.

Music created by WynnHarmonic using BeepBox.co

Second Game Jam. (ʘ ͟ʖ ʘ)

Made in 19.5 hours.

632 lines of code.

7 unique circuits.

80% Tutorial, 20% Hard.

Don't spam the pause button.

Though if you do, spam it again to fix it.

It's a feature - not a bug.

Game Jams are fun.

(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧

Devlog:

1.0 It'S aLiVE! - but don't worry, it won't bite.  If you're reading this, please disregard the text pasted on all the levels.
